TopicTitle: Mk3 Cockpit missing in tech tree and SPH/VAB

Articles.Content:
Not really sure what happened, but I'm missing Mk3 Cockpit from the tech tree and SPH/VAB. I installed a couple mod (cockpit internals, KAS and Mechjeb) so did something gets invalidated. If I start regular mode (not carreer) its still there and I can use them..

Please Help?

Edited February 16, 2014 by m4rt14n
It should be in "specialised control" which you already have researched, my guess is that MechJeb has changed it, don't forget MJ has altered pods with MJ added.

It should be in Heavy Aerodynamics. I think the mod screwed up because cfg file doesnt have:

TechRequired = heavyAerodynamics

entryCost = 15400

this. Is there any way I can download the original parts?

It should be in Heavy Aerodynamics. I think the mod screwed up because cfg file doesnt have:

TechRequired = heavyAerodynamics

entryCost = 15400

this. Is there any way I can download the original parts?

Just add that line to the cfg file for the part missing. It takes 30seconds and wont break anything.

Yeah I did. But it's missing a whole bunch of configurations... It seems that the part: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/mk3-cockpit-internals/ is made for .20 or older and not have the correct stuff. If someone could just PM or give a me a link to the original .CFG it would be nice..

Next time I should start backup-ing files before installing mod.. HEH

Yeah I did. But it's missing a whole bunch of configurations... It seems that the part: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/mk3-cockpit-internals/ is made for .20 or older and not have the correct stuff. If someone could just PM or give a me a link to the original .CFG it would be nice..

Next time I should start backup-ing files before installing mod.. HEH

I would if I were on my home computer, I backed up KSP before I installed any mods. This gives me a fallback so I don't have to redownload and install if something goes wrong... except when I had that nasty virus a few months back and lost the backup, and half of my other files too...........To say I was less than thrilled would be an understatement.
Yes. And you do have a lot of mods lol.

Yes. And you do have a lot of mods lol.

That I do. And when I restart my career mode, probably around .24, I will add two more. Looking to add intersteller mod, just for the precoolers that work, and a life support mod.

It should be in "specialised control" which you already have researched, my guess is that MechJeb has changed it, don't forget MJ has altered pods with MJ added.

Recent versions of MechJeb only includes 2 parts and do not alter any stock parts unless you do it yourself.

Also, PM sent to m4t14n.

Recent versions of MechJeb only includes 2 parts and do not alter any stock parts unless you do it yourself.

Also, PM sent to m4t14n.

Hey thanks!
